snippet.title: Scarlet Deer Inn - Xbox Announce
snippet.description:
Scarlet Deer Inn is an embroidered narrative platformer.
Players will experience an emotional story, an interesting cast of characters, a dark dungeon full of monsters, and branching dialogues leading to optional backstories and bonus locations in a unique mix of an adventure game and a fast paced platformer. The game stands out with its actually embroidered character frames and hand painted backgrounds inspired by Studio Ghibli movies, Slavic folklore, and medieval Europe.
